name: HoleThem!
description:
So first of all, sorry for the bad audio quality. This has been our first Game Jam made by a our small team. We are 3 programmers and one 3D artists. 

We plan on doing more games on the future, but this game Jam has been a great starting point for us.

This game is not over and we will update it until we are happy with it.

Left click to make holes, right click to create ground. 

Make all the blocks diferent from the color of the plataform to fall to the next one to gain points!
